import React, { useContext } from 'react' import { Context } from '../../context' import Input from '../../Components/UI/Input/Input' import MainBtn from '../../Components/UI/MainBtn/MainBtn' import './profile.scss' const Profile = ({ darkMode }) => { const { userInfo, setUserInfo } = useContext(Context) const styleObj = { avatarInput: { width: '100%', height: '100%', background: 'f9f9f9', borderRadius: '50%', fontSize: 0, cursor: 'pointer', }, input: { width: '540px', padding: '10px', background: 'f9f9f9', fontSize: '20px', border: '1px solid grey', }, btnStyles: { marginTop: '20px', padding: '10px 25px', borderRadius: '8px', backgroundColor: '#29a19c', fontSize: '18px', color: '#fafafa', }, } const chooseFile = e => { e.preventDefault() const reader = new FileReader() const file = e.target.files[0] reader.onload = () => { setUserInfo({ ...userInfo, photo: [file.name, reader.result] }) } reader.readAsDataURL(file) } return (
{userInfo.photo}
setUserInfo({ ...userInfo, nick: e.target.value })} />
save changes
) } export default Profile
